original_title: 過保護で独占欲が強く未だに子離れの出来ない母さんが僕だけに送る特別な視線
overview: He always scolds me, but he's still very kind... If you say so, she's a very ordinary mother who can be found anywhere, but I feel like she's a little different... Somehow... she looks at me with sparkling eyes like a girl who has a crush on me.
title: This Overprotective Mother Who Has Strong Exclusive Feelings for Her Child and Can't Stand for Him to Leave Her Nest Is Sending Me Special Signals Just to Me
